title: Shared Teams: Reuse a Team Across Multiple Contexts
summary: Create a shared team at the org level and apply it to new contexts; optionally allow local extension.

steps.label: Create a shared team
steps.action: New Shared Team; give it a clear name and (optionally) allow local extension in associated contexts.
steps.verify: Shared team appears in the list.

steps.label: Use shared team when creating a context
steps.action: Select the shared team; decide if local additions are permitted.
steps.verify: New context shows shared team roles/members; local additions respect settings.

steps.label: Where‑used
steps.action: From the shared team page, run ‘Show Team Uses’ to see which contexts are impacted by changes.
steps.verify: Report lists contexts using this shared team.
